descriptionHtml:
Also available at [url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=10657]Steam Workshop[/url]

This mod is multilingual [DE, EN].
The Mod is compatible with any version of Skyrim, inclusive Dawnguard.
Please endorse this mod if you like it.

Adds two new Potions, both are craftable on the Cookpot.
Yes the Cookpot, i wanted to seperate it from alchemy.

[color=green][b][u]-- Potion of Sanguinare Vampiris[/u][/b][/color]
Infects your character with Sanguinare Vampiris and all Spells of a Skyrim Vampire are usable.
It is a permanent change as long you are satisfied, otherwise see [url=http://www.gamefront.com/skyrim-how-to-cure-vampirism]here[/url].

[color=green][b][u]-- Potion of Lycanthropy[/u][/b][/color]
On use this Potion activates Werewolf Beast Form temporary.
The Beast Form remains as long as you are well feed, if the Beast Form is gone your character is normal like before.
This does not make your character to a full Werewolf like in the Companions-Quest and the Potion does not cure Vampirism.
So, yes it is possible to be a Vampire and change temporary to Werewolf Beast Form.

[color=yellow][b]Bugs:[/b][/color]
None so far, please report if you find some.

[color=yellow][b]Install:[/b][/color]
Copy the "data" folder from the archive to your Skyrim directory.
If asked to overwrite, say yes.
Start the Skyrim launcher, go to "Data Files" and make sure the files are activated.

[color=yellow][b]Uninstall:[/b][/color]
Delete the potion_vampiris_lycanthropy.esp from your "...\Skyrim\data" directory.

[color=yellow][b]Note:[/b][/color]
It might be that this affects some Quests, or maybe not, please feedback!
author: johnwayne1930
